Coffee Drinks.name: Espresso
Coffee Drinks.description: Pure and powerful. A shot of rich, concentrated coffee that's bold, intense, and ready to wake you up with every sip.

Coffee Drinks.name: Cappuccino
Coffee Drinks.description: Velvety foam, rich espresso, and a dash of boldness—this classic is your go-to for mornings that need a little magic.

Coffee Drinks.name: Latte
Coffee Drinks.description: Silky, smooth, and endlessly comforting. A warm blend of espresso and steamed milk that feels like your favorite sweater in a cup.

Coffee Drinks.name: Cold Brew
Coffee Drinks.description: Brewed slowly, chilled perfectly. This bold, smooth cold brew skips the heat but keeps the rich, strong kick, refreshing.

Tea.name: Earl Grey
Tea.description: A classic blend of black tea infused with fragrant bergamot. Elegant, fragrant, and calming, with a hint of citrus zest.

Tea.name: Chai Latte
Tea.description: A warm, spiced blend of black tea and milk, infused with cinnamon, cardamom, and cloves—rich, creamy, and full of flavor.

Tea.name: Green Tea
Tea.description: Light, refreshing, and full of antioxidants. This delicate brew offers a subtle grassy flavor with a smooth, calming finish.

Pastries.name: Croissant
Pastries.description: Flaky, buttery, and golden. This French classic is the perfect balance of crispy on the outside, soft on the inside.

Pastries.name: Chocolate Chip Cookie
Pastries.description: Chewy, indulgent, and packed with chocolate chips—your classic, sweet treat in every bite.

Pastries.name: Blueberry Muffin
Pastries.description: Bursting with fresh blueberries, this soft, moist muffin is a perfect balance of sweet and tangy in every bite.

Sandwiches.name: Avocado Toast
Sandwiches.description: Creamy avocado on toasted bread, lightly seasoned—simple, fresh, and always a delicious choice.

Sandwiches.name: Chicken Sandwich
Sandwiches.description: Tender chicken, fresh veggies, and zesty sauce, all tucked in soft bread—flavorful and satisfying.

Sandwiches.name: Veggie Wrap
Sandwiches.description: A wholesome blend of fresh veggies, wrapped in a soft tortilla—light, crunchy, and packed with flavor.

Crunch & Munch.name: Sausages
Crunch & Munch.description: Savory, juicy, and perfectly spiced, these sausages are a flavorful bite of pure satisfaction.

Crunch & Munch.name: French Fries
Crunch & Munch.description: Crispy on the outside, soft on the inside—these golden fries are the perfect snack or side.

Crunch & Munch.name: Samosa India
Crunch & Munch.description: Crispy pastry filled with spiced potatoes and peas—deliciously savory and perfect for a snack.

Crunch & Munch.name: Chips Masala
Crunch & Munch.description: Crispy fries tossed in aromatic spices—savory, tangy, and full of flavor in every bite.

Chilled Sips.name: Coca Cola
Chilled Sips.description: Chilled, fizzy, and timeless—perfectly sweet with that classic cola kick and refreshing feel in every sip.

Chilled Sips.name: Red Bull
Chilled Sips.description: Energizing and bold, this classic boost keeps you sharp, refreshed, and ready to power through.

Chilled Sips.name: Dasani Water
Chilled Sips.description: Clean, crisp, and refreshing—pure hydration for whenever you need a cool, calming sip.

Chilled Sips.name: Orange Juice
Chilled Sips.description: Fresh and fruity with a natural citrus zing—brightens your day, one sip at a time.
